short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: JiraCopy allows users to copy issue details and provides utilities to maintain consistency in Jira and Git workflows.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Formats and copies the branch name of the issue
- Formats and copies the commit message of the issue
- Customizable settings for the formatter
- Copies the issue code
- Copies the issue name
- Quick access button on the issue page

If you have any feature requests or suggestions for improvements, please feel free to share your ideas. Your feedback is valuable in enhancing the functionality of Jira Copy.
